name: Murderers II
description:
Choose one of two mages to fight in battle against an enemy army.
Each mage has different spells (and a few hidden tricks).

Read the tutorial (in-game) before playing !

Windows executable in downloads.

---

Made with LÖVE

You can find the .LOVE file in http://love2d.org/forums/viewtopic.php?f=5&t=81735

(You can play .love files after downloading the LÖVE player)
